title: Pset_ReinforcementBarCountOfIndependentFooting
description: Reinforcement Concrete parameter [ST-2]: The amount number information of reinforcement  bar with the independent footing. The X and Y direction are based on the local coordinate system of building storey. The X and Y direction of the reinforcement bar are parallel to the X and Y axis of the IfcBuildingStorey's local coordinate system, respectively.

Reference.title: Reference
Reference.description: A descriptive label for the general reinforcement type.

XDirectionLowerBarCount.title: XDirectionLowerBarCount
XDirectionLowerBarCount.description: The number of bars with X direction lower bar.

YDirectionLowerBarCount.title: YDirectionLowerBarCount
YDirectionLowerBarCount.description: The number of bars with Y direction lower bar.

XDirectionUpperBarCount.title: XDirectionUpperBarCount
XDirectionUpperBarCount.description: The number of bars with X direction upper bar.

YDirectionUpperBarCount.title: YDirectionUpperBarCount
YDirectionUpperBarCount.description: The number of bars with Y direction upper bar.
